tests.title: where_can_I_find_Llamasoft_application_training_materials/where_can_I_find_Llamasoft_application_training_materials-L1

err.message:
Error: where_can_I_find_Llamasoft_application_training_materials/where_can_I_find_Llamasoft_application_training_materials-L1/Line 6: Bot response (on Line 3: #me - Where can I find Llamasoft application training materials?) "For training resources including on-demand eLearning and live, instructor-led training, please visit the [Coupa University Edge Learning Portal](https://success.coupa.com/Learn). Please see the Course Catalog for available courses. If you do not have a Coupa-Okta login, please contact [Coupa](mailto:coupaportals@coupa.com)." expected to match "For knowledge and practices sharing, please visit the [CoupaCommunity Portal](https://coupa-external.okta.com/) and choose the **Coupa Community Portal**. Please see the available forums and news. If you don't have a Coupa-Okta login, please contact [Coupa](mailto:coupaportals@coupa.com)."
########################################
ASSERTION FAILED in TextMatchAsserter - Expected: ["For knowledge and practices sharing, please visit the [CoupaCommunity Portal](https://coupa-external.okta.com/) and choose the **Coupa Community Portal**. Please see the available forums and news. If you don't have a Coupa-Okta login, please contact [Coupa](mailto:coupaportals@coupa.com)."]  - Actual: "For training resources including on-demand eLearning and live, instructor-led training, please visit the [Coupa University Edge Learning Portal](https://success.coupa.com/Learn). Please see the Course Catalog for available courses. If you do not have a Coupa-Okta login, please contact [Coupa](mailto:coupaportals@coupa.com)."
INPUT: Where can I find Llamasoft application training materials?
------------ TRANSCRIPT ----------------------------
#me: Where can I find Llamasoft application training materials?
#bot: For training resources including on-demand eLearning and live, instructor-led training, please visit the [Coupa University Edge Learning Portal](https://success.coupa.com/Learn). 
Please see the Course Catalog for available courses.
If you do not have a Coupa-Okta login, please contact [Coupa](mailto:coupaportals@coupa.com).
